tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Clever Bird Goes Fishing

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. Have fun!!!

If "knowing everything"﻿ (what i never said Darwin did btw) means to live forever and protect from cancer and other stuff, religios people would die very young. Falsification (Falsifizierung) via Karl Popper.
SMART BIRD!﻿

When you have made a comment that god does not exist then the responsibility is first and foremeost on you. Many atheist like you hide behind the fact that you can not disprove his non existence therefore trap a believer in god to prove what he could not disprove in the first place. There are plenty of true science that god exists and he is the designer of this ever expanding universe(﻿ the quran) but scientist recently said that discovery. The formation of a child in the quran!

That is amazing!﻿ It's amazing how clever birds can be. And how the hell is there a fight between different religions on a video of a bird eating a fish..? Lol that's just silly. You should take a leaf out of new Zealand's book, here we live in a multi cultural and religiously diverse society ;)

i will tell you how this fight started am i not in my right to say subhanallah or glory to allah?? I am in my right to comment on the intelligence of this bird which i believe allah has endowned﻿ on it. One atheist started accusing another same person who commented the god is great being delusional and we can not prove god existence. well that is how the debate started. I still maintain my thanks to allah

this bird is a genius among the﻿ other birds
Salut﻿
Poor bird, poor fish...o - o﻿
Holy shit! and I thought only monkeys can use tools﻿ like humans.
well technically Youtube is available worldwide in most countries...﻿

No other but quran could tell you exactly the shape of the earth like an ostrich egg which is spherical in the first place. But the quran is not a scientific book and science is based on hypothesis first and then﻿ it can collapse or develop because of its and our limitations. The quran is a miracle book send by god toguide mankind !! Read it and it will details that god exists but it does gives you scientific facts. Science can not be used as a parameter to prove or disprove faith.

Nature has displayed a lot of﻿ arabic word of allah like on the bee hives, the tree that does our prayer and the corvine birds that calls the name of allah. Too many animals and even trees fear god and mimick the position of islamic prayers. Why?

I am excited about u proving God by dropping bread to a bird and watch it fishing with it. A few will, most not. What would mean god designed only a very few fishing birds within one species. what would make no sense at all, because if god decides to let the species of birds survive, he would need to﻿ learn fishing to all of the species. If he doesnt need the birds, he would'nt show some birds within that species how to fishing. A god that loves all lifeforms, would make em live without eating.
well technically Youtube is available worldwide﻿ in﻿ most countries, not just the USA.
The quran?? This﻿ is America. Get a Bible or Get OUT!!!!

thank you allah your is amazing and your wonders amazing and are a sign to the world and we believe in you and the angels and the quran and the prophets and﻿ fate and the day of judgement!! masha allah and there is no god worthy of worship but allah!
